pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Babel extractor for vue.js==========================|Build Status| |Coverage Status|Babel messages extractor for vue.js templates.*vue.js* — Reactive Components for Modern Web Interfaces. Site:http://vuejs.org/.*Babel* — Internationalization library for Python. Site:http://babel.pocoo.org/... image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nonamenix/babel-vue-extractor/master/babel_vuejs.pngInstall-------.. code:: pip install babel-vue-extractorUsage-----Add to your babel config.. code:: [babelvueextractor.extract.extract_vue: **.vue]Usage in .vhtml files---------------------.. code::

{{ gettext('Hello') }}

{{ ngettext('Foo', 'Foos', 1) }}

{{ gettext('Processed by filter')|somefilter }}

Issue Tracking--------------GitHub: `https://github.com/nonamenix/babel-vue-extractor/issues `_.. |Build Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/nonamenix/babel-vue-extractor.svg :target: https://travis-ci.org/nonamenix/babel-vue-extractor :alt: Build Status.. |Coverage Status| image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/nonamenix/babel-vue-extractor/badge.svg?branch=master&service=github&v=0.1.3.1 :target: https://coveralls.io/github/nonamenix/babel-vue-extractor?branch=master :alt: Coverage Status
